archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Guide Billing Events
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Ensures that the event records used in the billing processes are related to the correct customer billing account and subscribed products.

properties.value: The Guide Billing Events processes ensure that the event records used in the billing process relate to the correct customer billing account and products. A specific event record may be related to multiple customer billing accounts and subscribed products. Distribution of billing event records to other processes may also occur.
